name: Rorty
description:
The events unfold on an intergalactic cruiser which carries a small colony of people to a recently discovered planet for the purpose of research and expansion. Due to a system failure, after 4 years in space, the cruiser collides with an asteroid, which damages the ship and endangers hundreds of lives. After the catastrophe, the life support system has deployed a robotic team to rescue the colonists who are still in a state of anabiosis. You will have to figure out how to save the passengers and restore the damaged cruiser.
